question:
Fill in the Blank:

The workers are ________ their bonus.
solution:
eager for

‘Eager for’ means strongly wanting something.

Hindi Meaning: उत्साहित या उत्साही

Complete Sentence:

The workers are eager for their bonus.

कर्मचारी अपने बोनस के लिए उत्सुक हैं।

Extra Example:

She is eager for the trip.

वह यात्रा को लेकर उत्साहित है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The new rule had a big ________ the staff.
solution:
effect on

‘Effect on’ is used to show impact.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ का प्रभाव

Complete Sentence:

The new rule had a big effect on the staff.

नए नियम का कर्मचारियों पर बड़ा प्रभाव पड़ा।

Extra Example:

Pollution has a bad effect on health.

प्रदूषण का स्वास्थ्य पर बुरा असर होता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is very ________ multitasking.
solution:
efficient at

'Efficient at' specific tasks.

Hindi Meaning: उत्पादक रूप से कार्य करना

Complete Sentence:

She is efficient at multitasking.

वह एक साथ कई कामों में कुशल है।

Extra Example:

She is efficient at handling customers.

वह ग्राहकों को संभालने में कुशल है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ the scholarship.
solution:
eligible for

‘Eligible for’ means qualified to receive.

Hindi Meaning: करने या प्राप्त करने का अधिकार होना

Complete Sentence:

She is eligible for the scholarship.

वह छात्रवृत्ति के लिए योग्य है।

Extra Example:

He is eligible for the post.

वह पद के लिए पात्र है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The teacher put ________ hard work.
solution:
emphasis on

‘Emphasis on’ means to stress or highlight.

Hindi Meaning: महत्व दिया गया

Complete Sentence:

The teacher put emphasis on hard work.

शिक्षक ने कठिन परिश्रम पर ज़ोर दिया।

Extra Example:

There is emphasis on practical learning.

व्यावहारिक शिक्षा पर जोर दिया जाता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He decided to ________ political debates.
solution:
engage in

‘Engage in’ means to participate or involve oneself.

Hindi Meaning: इसमें भाग लेने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

He decided to engage in political debates.

उसने राजनीतिक बहसों में भाग लेने का निर्णय लिया।

Extra Example:

He engaged in volunteer work.

वह स्वेच्छा से सेवा कार्य में लगा रहा।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He was ________ the rude waiter.
solution:
enraged at

'Enraged at' means very angry about someone’s action.

Hindi Meaning: बहुत ही नाराज़

Complete Sentence:

He was enraged at the rude waiter.

वह बदतमीज़ वेटर पर गुस्से में था।

Extra Example:

The public was enraged at the delay.

जनता देरी पर क्रोधित थी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She decided to ________ a new course at the university.
solution:
enroll in

‘Enroll in’ means to register for a course or program.

Hindi Meaning: किसी पाठ्यक्रम या कार्यक्रम के लिए पंजीकरण करने हेतु

Complete Sentence:

She decided to enroll in a new course.

उसने एक नए कोर्स में नामांकन लेने का निर्णय लिया।

Extra Example:

She enrolled in the MBA program.

उसने MBA कार्यक्रम में नामांकन किया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They are ________ the annual event.
solution:
enthusiastic about

‘Enthusiastic about’ means very excited.

Hindi Meaning: उत्सुकता दिखाना

Complete Sentence:

They are enthusiastic about the event.

वे वार्षिक कार्यक्रम को लेकर बहुत उत्साहित हैं।

Extra Example:

They are enthusiastic about the concert.

वे संगीत कार्यक्रम को लेकर उत्साहित हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ his colleague's success.
solution:
envious of

‘Envious of’ means feeling jealousy.

Hindi Meaning: ईर्ष्या

Complete Sentence:

He is envious of his colleague’s success.

वह अपने सहयोगी की सफलता से ईर्ष्या करता है।

Extra Example:

He is envious of his colleague’s success.

वह अपने सहयोगी की सफलता से ईर्ष्यालु है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

No one is ________ the law.
solution:
equal to

'Equal to' means having the same value or rights.

Hindi Meaning: समान मूल्य होना

Complete Sentence:

No one is equal to the law.

कोई भी कानून के बराबर नहीं है।

Extra Example:

This amount is equal to 100 rupees.

यह राशि 100 रुपये के बराबर है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The prisoners tried to ________ jail but were caught.
solution:
escape from

‘Escape from’ means to flee a place or situation.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ से दूर जाना

Complete Sentence:

The prisoners tried to escape from jail but were caught.

कैदियों ने जेल से भागने की कोशिश की लेकिन पकड़े गए।

Extra Example:

The prisoner escaped from jail.

कैदी जेल से भाग गया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The thief managed to ________ the forest.
solution:
escape into

‘Escape into’ implies entering another place while escaping.

Hindi Meaning: किसी स्थान या परिस्थिति में भाग जाना

Complete Sentence:

The thief managed to escape into the forest.

चोर जंगल में भाग जाने में सफल रहा।

Extra Example:

He escaped into the forest.

वह जंगल में भाग गया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The thief managed to ________ the stolen money.
solution:
escape with

‘Escape with’ means to flee carrying something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ से बच निकलना

Complete Sentence:

The thief managed to escape with the stolen money.

चोर चोरी का पैसा लेकर भाग गया।

Extra Example:

The robber escaped with the cash.

डाकू नकदी लेकर भाग गया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

This is a good ________ teamwork.
solution:
example of

‘Example of’ indicates illustration.

Hindi Meaning: उदाहरण या चित्रण

Complete Sentence:

This is a good example of teamwork.

यह टीम वर्क का एक अच्छा उदाहरण है।

Extra Example:

This is an example of good behavior.

यह अच्छे व्यवहार का उदाहरण है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is very ________ the trip to Europe.
solution:
excited about

‘Excited about’ means looking forward to.

Hindi Meaning: खुश और उत्साहित महसूस करना

Complete Sentence:

She is very excited about the trip.

वह यूरोप यात्रा को लेकर बहुत उत्साहित है।

Extra Example:

They are excited about the picnic.

वे पिकनिक को लेकर उत्साहित हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There is no ________ coming late.
solution:
excuse for

‘Excuse for’ means justification for a mistake.

Hindi Meaning: औचित्य सिद्ध करने के लिए दिया गया कारण

Complete Sentence:

There is no excuse for coming late.

देर से आने का कोई बहाना नहीं है।

Extra Example:

He made an excuse for being late.

उसने देर से आने का बहाना बनाया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She has ________ customer service.
solution:
experience in

‘Experience in’ is used for fields/areas.

Hindi Meaning: व्यावहारिक ज्ञान

Complete Sentence:

She has experience in customer service.

उसे ग्राहक सेवा में अनुभव है।

Extra Example:

She has experience in teaching.

उसे पढ़ाने का अनुभव है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He gave a clear ________ his actions.
solution:
explanation for

'Explanation for' shows reason behind something.

Hindi Meaning: स्पष्टीकरण

Complete Sentence:

He gave a clear explanation for his actions.

उसने अपने कार्यों के लिए स्पष्ट विवरण दिया।

Extra Example:

He gave an explanation for his absence.

उसने अपनी अनुपस्थिति के लिए स्पष्टीकरण दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She still has strong ________ humanity.
solution:
faith in

'Faith in' expresses trust.

Hindi Meaning: विश्वास या भरोसा

Complete Sentence:

She still has strong faith in humanity.

उसे मानवता पर अभी भी गहरा विश्वास है।

Extra Example:

I have faith in you.

मुझे तुम पर भरोसा है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ his duties.
solution:
faithful in

'Faithful in' is used with actions/responsibilities.

Hindi Meaning: वफादार या भरोसेमंद

Complete Sentence:

He is faithful in his duties.

वह अपने कर्तव्यों में निष्ठावान है।

Extra Example:

He is faithful in his service.

वह अपनी सेवा में ईमानदार है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is always ________ her friends.
solution:
faithful to

‘Faithful to’ means loyal.

Hindi Meaning: वफादार या समर्पित

Complete Sentence:

She is always faithful to her friends.

वह हमेशा अपने दोस्तों के प्रति वफादार रहती है।

Extra Example:

Dogs are faithful to their owners.

कुत्ते अपने मालिकों के प्रति वफादार होते हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ his principles.
solution:
faithful towards

'Faithful towards' implies loyalty or dedication.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के प्रति वफादार या समर्पित

Complete Sentence:

He is faithful towards his principles.

वह अपने सिद्धांतों के प्रति निष्ठावान है।

Extra Example:

The employee was faithful towards the company.

कर्मचारी कंपनी के प्रति वफादार था।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Don’t ________ bad habits.
solution:
fall into

‘Fall into’ means to become involved in something bad or unwanted.

Hindi Meaning: किसी राज्य या श्रेणी का हिस्सा बनना

Complete Sentence:

Don’t fall into bad habits.

बुरी आदतों में मत पड़ो।

Extra Example:

She fell into a deep sleep.

वह गहरी नींद में चली गई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

This name is ________ many people.
solution:
familiar to

‘Familiar to’ means recognizable by others.

Hindi Meaning: पहचानने योग्य

Complete Sentence:

This name is familiar to many people.

यह नाम कई लोगों को जाना-पहचाना लगता है।

Extra Example:

Her voice is familiar to me.

उसकी आवाज़ मेरे लिए जानी-पहचानी है।
